summary: 1999 FORD TAURUS LOST POWER STEERING, PUMP AND RACK NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  THE CAR HAD 36,264 MILES, WARRENTY WAS UP AT 36,000.  WE THOUGHT THIS WAS A SAFETY ISSUE, CONTACTED FORD AND THEY WERE NOT OVERLY CONCERNED.  WE ALSO THOUGHT THEY SHOULD REIMBURSE SOME OF THE  $1400 COST TO REPLACE THE PARTS.
